aocr:verbatimInstitution: The New York Botanical Garden Institute of Economic Botany
dwc:verbatimLocality: DOMINICA.Carib Territory. Ridge Road, roadside, Bataka. Roadside, steep dropoff
dwc:fieldNotes: Direct sun, dry soil. Shrub to 4m; flowers small, pink/white; pistils gr leaves shiny green, bark brown, smooth. NV: Bois Die? Dye [Creole] USES; Charm against spells {bark or dryed wood}. As tea. The dryed wood is burned first.
